author: Special Correspondent
text:
Actor Yugi Sethu speaking at the ‘Karisal Thiraivizhaa’ inauguration in Tirunelveli on Wednesday.

The 11th edition of ‘Karisal Thiraivizha’, being organised by Mano Media Club of Department of Communication, Manonmaniam Sundaranar University, commenced here on Wednesday.

Registrar, MSU, A. John De Britto, inaugurated the three-day event.

Chief guest of the inaugural function and actor Yugi Sethu said the students of communication should try to understand and learn the essence of real life to make their presence felt in the tinsel world.

Director of Distance and Continuing Education, MSU, Narayanaswamy Kannan, and Controller of Examinations S. Prabahar spoke.
title: ‘Karisal Thiraivizha’ begins
